modName: Better Skill and Quest Books Names
summary: No more opening every book or checking it's value to see if it increases a skill or gives you a quest. This mod renames skill books and quest books so that you can identify them quickly by just hovering with your crosshair. It also renames some journals, notes, and letters with the same purpose.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=4][color=#ff7700]> [/color][/size][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/5260]SPECIAL EDITION AVAILABLE HERE[/url][/size][size=4][color=#ff7700] <[/color][/size]


[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8157/7360210256_5a3c4caf60_b.jpg[/img] [/center]

[center] [size=4] [color=red]IMPORTANT:[/color] If you use Better Sorting mod by Headbomb, switch to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26230]Sharlikrans Compatibility Patches[/url] version of Better Sorting, it fixes a few problems with that mod and diminishes/eliminates CTDs.[/size] [/center]

[center] [img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8192/8084444563_4b5849e08c_o.jpg[/img] [/center]
Yet another rename books mod. I know there are a couple of mods that do the same around the nexus, but I made this for myself and thought I should share. I liked the idea of Better Skill Books, but I'm also using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863]SkyUI[/url] (which makes the inventory have smaller fonts), so I wanted the books to have the entire skill name at the begining.

Basically it renames books to show the skills asociated with them at the begining of the book's name, some examples:

[list]
[*](Alchemy) A Game at Dinner
[*](Alteration) Daughter of the Niben
[*](Archery) The Gold Ribbon of Merit
[*](Block) Death Blow of Abernanit
[*](Conjuration) The Doors of Oblivion
[*](Destruction) Horror of Castle Xyr
[*](Enchanting) Enchanter's Primer
[*](Heavy Armor) Hallgerd's Tale
[*](Illusion) Incident at Necrom
[*](Light Armor) The Rear Guard
[*](Lockpicking) The Locked Room
[*](One-Handed) The Importance of Where
[*](Pickpocket) Purloined Shadows
[*](Restoration) Withershins
[*](Smithing) The Armorer's Challenge
[*](Sneak) Three Thieves
[*](Speech) A Dance in Fire, Vol. 6
[*](Two-Handed) Words and Philosophy
[/list]It also renames functional books (the ones that add map markers, and the ones that provide quests) to the following names:

[list]
[*](Map Markers) An Explorer's Guide to Skyrim
[*](Map Markers) Daynas Valen's Notes
[*](Map Marker) Deathbrand [color=red]*[/color]
[*](Map Marker) Individual prefix for several notes and letters that add 1 map marker each.
[*](Quest) The Legend of Red Eagle
[*](Quest) Lost Legends
[*](Quest) Boethiah's Proving
[*](Quest) Sinderion's Field Journal
[*](Quest) The Aetherium Wars [color=green]**[/color]
[*](Quest) Ahzidal's Descent [color=red]*[/color]
[*](Quest) Lusty Argonian Maid Folio [color=red]*[/color]
[/list][color=red]*[/color] Available with Dragonborn
[color=green]**[/color] Available with Dawnguard

- [color=yellow]Hearthfire:[/color] Note that Hearthfire is not required for this mod, none of the books added by this DLC are skill books, quest books, or map marker books.


[size=3][color=#FFC125][u]What version of Better Sorting mod should you use?[/u][/color][/size]

I use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26230]Better Sorting[/url] mod so I made it compatible with it, but I also uploaded a vanilla version if you want to use it without that mod (though in vanilla the names in the inventory will probably be cut off for being too long). [color=#FFC125]Be aware[/color] that the version of Better Sorting I use is the one fixed by Sharlikran, [b]NOT[/b] the original one made by Headbomb (this one has some errors in it caused by the mod being made before the CK was available, which were fixed by Sharlikran). My mod will work fine with both Better Sorting mods, but you should use Sharlikran's, since it will help you diminish/eliminate potential conflicts and/or CTDs.

You have my permission to translate this mod if the translation will be uploaded to the Nexus. I only ask that you let me know, and that you send me the link so I can include your translation in this description (as well as credit you, of course). If you want to upload it to other sites, ask me first via PM, I'll probably say yes but don't take my permission for granted.

If any of the translations are outdated, please [b][color=red]ask the translators to update them[/color][/b]. If you know how to do it yourself, go ahead and then send me a link to the updated version.


[center] [img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8053/8084444929_bc7f997a59_o.jpg[/img] [/center]
As a general rule, any mod that changes or modifies skill/quest/map marker books names won't be compatible with my mod.

[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10012]Unread Books Glow[/url] (by duggelz): this mod is compatible with mine, the books I edited will show the (Skill), (Quest) or (Map Marker) prefix, and also the (Unread) suffix.
[/list]For example: the alchemy skill book 'A Game at Dinner' will show up as '(Alchemy) A Game at Dinner (Unread)', and after you read it its name will be '(Alchemy) A Game at Dinner'.
